channel.title: [317] Project-Extracted - Economy Based - Just Started
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I want to welcome you all to our advertisement thread. This server has been a project ran by two people, myself as the developer, and Jason as the funder.
With his ideas in mind I aimed to create a good economy-based server for tons of players to game on, we feature a lot of content so that the players can find a lot to do in the server.
Goal: Our overall goal here is to work on and continue developing a server that both has a great economy and has a great community. Until that goal is achieved we will updating the source.
Anyway, enough about us lets talk about the server.
[U][B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B][/U]
[ul][*]Revision: Up to Spirit Shields (features OSRS items though). [*]Wilderness Resource Area / Bosses [*]Bounty Hunter (esq) PvP. (Target + Wealth Skull & Bonus) [*]All Skills Accessible [*]Tons of Training Areas/Dungeons/Bosses/Mini-Games to take part in [*]Dedicated and Mature Staff team. [*]Vbulletin forums (not nulled). [*]+ much more[/ul]
[img]http://s28.postimg.org/s6to5ss6l/Home.png[/img]
Draynor is our selected home, and I'm going to help break it down to you so you can get around faster.
I'm the white dot in the middle of the path outside the bank.
[b]WEST:[/b] Stalls: The 3 basic thieving stalls are here. Diango: (Exchanges Cash Vouchers, Sells Mithril Seeds/Dice) Gambler: Gambling Vouchers used here. Melee, Magic, Range Tutors: Gives 1 free set of their respective class to the player. Monk of Entrana: MAP based clues are used here, depending on their class (easy, medium, hard) you will pay to be teleported to the exact location. Hollowed Cave: To enter you must pay 500K, but once inside you gain access to fighting the Mithril Dragon, and Brutal Green Dragons.
[b]NORTH:[/b] Cooking Range: Obvious Shops: All the main vendors of the game are located here.
[b]EAST:[/b] Duradel: Assigns a Slayer Task. Lever: Teleports to Chaos Elemental Trapdoor: [NEW] boss Dessous (drops an Onyx ring, once enchanted gives player a ring which cuts the average drain rate of prayer in HALF).
[b]SOUTH:[/b] Cows & Chickens: Basic training at it's finest. Kalphite Entrance: You know the deal. ;) Old Man: Use his boat to access Barrelchest
[b]BANK:[/b] Prayer Altar: Recharge prayer and use bones on the Altar here. Magic Altar: Switch to different spell books here. Duradel's Personal Glory: Free for 7 uses, afterwards 500K per use. Teleports player DIRECTLY to their Slayer task. Crystal Key Chest: Chance of giving the players much needed Natures, Mantas, Sharks, Dragonstones, or other MISC. items. Gilded Wardrobe: Customizing Character. Cape of Legends: Edgeville Teleport.
[SPOILER=Home Media] [img]http://puu.sh/c7k9M/38cdfd9902.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7khv/701eb44c6b.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7k3L/5c0928d91a.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7k6E/12b10e26d3.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7k81/7dea9f497e.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kbG/810bbdeb65.jpg[/img] [img]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/slayer_zps1cdc9c0b.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2012/11/lumbridge_swamp_dungeon_points-06154931.jpg[/img]
Basic Training Dungeon: This area includes the following NPCs Rock Crab: Level 12 Experiment: Level 44 Experiment: Level 57 Experiment: Level 9 Experiment: Level 97
[img]http://puu.sh/cpsy5/26abd9421a.jpg[/img]
This one is pretty obvious, most of your Tasks can be found here.
[img]http://puu.sh/cpsC6/1c30640146.jpg[/img]
We offer the following mini-games (currently):
[b]Fighter Arena:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kB6/5653a2dcee.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kCp/13903ade5e.jpg[/img]
[b]Pest Control:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/cpsFV/04c25678af.jpg[/img] Self-explanatory.
[b]Duel Arena:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kXd/56ba5045fd.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kYQ/1a99b71395.jpg[/img]
[b]Fight Pits:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kDP/bb47afdeb9.jpg[/img]
[b]Barrows:[/b] [img]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/barrows_zpsfce66d51.jpg[/img]
We offer the following Dungeons (currently): [img]http://puu.sh/cpsOP/c44558ec5a.jpg[/img]
While I could post pictures of each area these dungeons usually are the same with every source. Therefore media explaining them would be pointless.
[b]Key Areas:[/b] Fight Pits Fight Caves Blue Dragons Bronze Dragons Iron Dragons Steel Dragons Black Dragons
We offer the following bosses (currently): [img]http://puu.sh/cpsTC/efe57984ab.jpg[/img] NOT IN TELEPORTS: Chaos Elemental, Black Knight Titan, Trues Dayth, Sea Troll, Dessous, Kalphite Queen, Barrelchest.
[img]http://puu.sh/c7ln1/3de5f82229.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7lqE/237a1438f4.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7lsC/87ed35a19c.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7leq/759ee70e6f.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7lcM/25e74a72c5.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7l4j/523df9a886.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7l1Y/dee3c64796.jpg[/img]
Skilling: [img]http://puu.sh/cpt1r/8b6a4fb5ce.jpg[/img] A big part of this server is the Skilling as high skill levels are required in many things you do in the source. On here, the whole island of Miscellania is a training ground for Skilling.
You can find anything from Mining Rocks, to Magic Trees, and so on. Here you can also purchase Slaves and get yourself a [i]SKILLING TASK[/i].
Now, as I just showed basically the core of the server there are tons of new features we wish our players to take advantage of, I got a jumbled list of media from the source to give you an idea of some of the things to do in the server.
[SPOILER=Random Media] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kjr/5e13620646.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kmH/4a666cff71.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kqB/2ace250753.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7lgh/ba1d5115cf.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7ktW/d720287c1e.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/c7kvh/6a6c131c08.jpg[/img] [img]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/fishingtonote_zps86589351.jpg[/img] [img]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/gemtobolts3_zps7597b1fb.jpg[/img] HARD: [img]http://puu.sh/cptf8/1d66fdb833.jpg[/img] MEDIUM: [img]http://puu.sh/cptg0/a1e761a63a.jpg[/img] EASY: [img]http://puu.sh/cptgF/e6f714f91f.jpg[/img] ALL CLUE LEVELS + REWARDS ADDED [img]http://puu.sh/cptlk/547cbee29e.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cptw3/892f504716.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cptz1/e415c8ce1f.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/cptAY/c88b294cd0.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Latest Update] First you will need to update your client do so here: Here
Today the following updates/patches were introduced.
Clue Scroll Rewards + Interface(s) have now been fixed and they should all work 100% now.
All 256 slots in the Drop Log are now use-able.
A new boss has been added (Dessous) he can be found just EAST of the Home area. Use the trapdoor.
This boss drops some good items, but his best item is an Onyx Ring which can be enchanted to a Ring of Prayer which cuts the average prayer drain rate in HALF.
New UPDATE:
The bosses listed are now obtainable, they are dropped by their respective bosses, rarely. Enjoy .
You can now obtain the 3 3rd Age Weapons (Wand, Longsword, Bow) from Hard Clues.
You can now obtain the Katana by killing the Black Knight Titan.
You can now obtain the 3 OSRS rings by killing the Wild Bosses (Black Knight Titan, Sea Troll, Treus Dayth). Each drops one of them.
The Clue Scroll teleport that the Entrana Monk offers now has a price cut. Easy Clues: 100K Medium Clues: 250K Hard Clues: 500K.
For those of you who were having problems Farming, any issues regarding Herb farming should be cleared up. (Dibbler, Water Can, and Rake in skilling shop).
For those of you having problems exchanging points for Void armour, any and all issues should be resolved now. [/SPOILER]
[size=14pt][b][url=http://www.projectextracted.com/Play/client.jar]PLAY NOW[/url][/b][/size]
Question/Comments? Post here :)
Please only post constructive criticism as any flame will be disregarded/reported, thanks for reading. :)

item.title: [317] Project-Extracted - Economy Based - Just Started
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“CleanCut, post:9, topic:547210”]Agreed with Aetoc.

It’s sad to see a server fall to the early inconvenient decisions made by anxious owners. Constantly updating day 1 and then resetting the entire player base day 2 has caused this server a premature death.[/quote]

While you both have decided to quit, our community is continuing to grow. I understand you may be upset about the course of our action, but it’s just what had to be done. We’ll continue to grow with, or without your support.

Hopefully you’ll change your mind, eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project-Extracted - Economy Based - Just Started
item.dc:creator: @CleanCut CleanCut
item.description:
@CleanCut wrote:

Agreed with Aetoc.

It’s sad to see a server fall to the early inconvenient decisions made by anxious owners. Constantly updating day 1 and then resetting the entire player base day 2 has caused this server a premature death.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project-Extracted - Economy Based - Just Started
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Aetoc:

Well sorry my view has to change. There were issues with the eco i guess and everyone who slaved on Day 1 got punished by being reset to nothing. I was planning to play for the long run but i stayed up all night to raise skills that make you want to rip your head off, and also i had alot of assets that didn’t ruin the economy. How do you expect me to just say “ok” and start over? I sadly won’t come back unless i am compensated my skills and items. Otherwise good luck on building your eco system.

I understand your frustration and allow me to apologize firsthand for what happened…

A few things were discovered that we weren’t sure about and after a full night and day we found out most of the issues (if not all) and fixed them. A lot of players are upset but we only did this so we could continue to see the Economy w were hoping to see.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project-Extracted - Economy Based - Just Started
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc

I was planning to play for the long run but i stayed up all night to raise skills that make you want to rip your head off, and also i had alot of assets that didn’t ruin the economy. How do you expect me to just say “ok” and start over? I sadly won’t come back unless i am compensated my skills and items. Otherwise good luck on building your eco system.

Read full topic

With his ideas in mind I aimed to create a good economy-based server for tons of players to game on, we feature a lot of content so that the players can find a lot to do in the server.

[]+ much more[/ul]

WEST:
Stalls: The 3 basic thieving stalls are here.

SOUTH:
Cows & Chickens: Basic training at it’s finest.
Kalphite Entrance: You know the deal.
Old Man: Use his boat to access Barrelchest

BANK:
Prayer Altar: Recharge prayer and use bones on the Altar here.
Magic Altar: Switch to different spell books here.
Duradel’s Personal Glory: Free for 7 uses, afterwards 500K per use. Teleports player DIRECTLY to their Slayer task.
Crystal Key Chest: Chance of giving the players much needed Natures, Mantas, Sharks, Dragonstones, or other MISC. items.
Gilded Wardrobe: Customizing Character.

[SPOILER=Home Media]







[/spoiler]

Basic Training Dungeon: This area includes the following NPCs
Rock Crab: Level 12
Experiment: Level 44
Experiment: Level 57
Experiment: Level 9
Experiment: Level 97

This one is pretty obvious, most of your Tasks can be found here.

We offer the following mini-games (currently):

Self-explanatory.

Fight Pits:

MEDIUM:

ALL CLUE LEVELS + REWARDS ADDED

First you will need to update your client do so here: Here

Today the following updates/patches were introduced.

Clue Scroll Rewards + Interface(s) have now been fixed and they should all work 100% now.

All 256 slots in the Drop Log are now use-able.

A new boss has been added (Dessous) he can be found just EAST of the Home area. Use the trapdoor.

This boss drops some good items, but his best item is an Onyx Ring which can be enchanted to a Ring of Prayer which cuts the average prayer drain rate in HALF.
